remarks: The addition of two continuous complex functions is continuous. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
subcncf.a $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> A ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
subcncf.b $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> B ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
subcncf $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> ( A - B ) ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
